row.process:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Query" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_SQL_QUERY# :SET &UC4RB_DB_SQL_QUERY# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DB_SQL_QUERY#, "%", "%%")
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL User" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Connection String" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver JAR" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver Class" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Interval" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Number of Connection Retries" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Oracle tnsnames.ora URI" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Output seperator" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_SQL_SEPARATOR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Additional Properties" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_ADD_PROP#
!find % character and add escape character in URIs :SET &POST# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#, "%") :IF &POST# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#, "%", "%%") :ENDIF
:SET &POST# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA#, "%") :IF &POST# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA#, "%", "%%") :ENDIF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&JDBC_TOOL_JAR#" database SQLFeature -query "&UC4RB_DB_SQL_QUERY#" ? &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# -out "&UC4RB_DB_SQL_SEPARATOR#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
